Then there might not be one for that. But since this ISN'T Windows, you are free to go and change the source code!

That control center is VEEERY old.
haha, okay, but it still has auto-hide delay!
In gconf-editor, go to apps/panel/profiles/defailt/toplevels/<the panel you want to change>/ and find there "hide_delay".
